hooks.command: echo '\n[HAL 9000 ONLINE]\n' && hal9000 context 2>/dev/null && hal9000 services status --quiet 2>/dev/null || echo '[NOTICE] Services not running. Run: hal9000 services diagnose'
hal9000 context 2>/dev/null && hal9000 services status --check-only 2>/dev/null || echo '⚠️ [HAL ALERT] Service failure detected. Run: hal9000 services diagnose'
echo '<hal-context task="agenda">' && hal9000 preferences get agenda 2>/dev/null || echo 'No agenda preferences found - run first-time setup' && echo '</hal-context>'
echo '<hal-context task="calendar">' && hal9000 preferences get calendar 2>/dev/null || echo 'No calendar preferences found' && echo '</hal-context>'
echo '<hal-context task="url">' && hal9000 preferences get url 2>/dev/null || echo 'No URL preferences found - run first-time setup' && echo '</hal-context>'
